title: 165: The Great Divorce
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: "The Great Divorce," by C.S. Lewis, recounts a bus trip to heaven. We discuss the Problem of Evil in the perspective of the book.
itunes:author: The Tragedian, The Lizard Guy, and Napoleon
itunes:subtitle: Is Hell a thing?
